Tallahassee.Bond-South City, Florida:
Bond-South City was a census-designated place in Leon County, Florida during the 1950 and 1960 censuses, which consists of the communities of Bond and South City.


== Population ==
The population in 1950 was 4,611. However, subsequent annexations by Tallahassee reduced the census area's population to 1,148 by 1960.
